definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)

sentences.english: This day, John sees a drama again, call 《park street murder case 》.
sentences.chinese: 這天，約翰又去看一齣戲，叫《公園街謀殺案》。

sentences.english: It was a clear, sunny day. The weather was beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 這天風和日麗，天氣真好。

sentences.english: Lantern Festival day everywhere decorated, beaming.
sentences.chinese: 元宵節這天到處張燈結綵，喜氣洋洋。

sentences.english: It was the day of the festival for Vulcan , the Roman god of fire.
sentences.chinese: 這天是慶祝羅馬火神伏爾肯的節日。

sentences.english: To this day, Aidan’s parents don’t know where the battery came from.
sentences.chinese: 直到這天，艾丹的父母都不知道電池是從哪裏來的。

sentences.english: I arrived at Greta‘s house today just after sunset.
sentences.chinese: 這天，太陽剛下山我就來到葛麗塔家了。

sentences.english: On that morning their eyes were swollen with tears.
sentences.chinese: 這天早上，他們的眼睛都哭腫了。

sentences.english: A special meeting was to be held that day in Bengma Motor Company in Ottawa, Canada.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大渥太華的奔馬公汽公司這天舉行一次特別會議。

sentences.english: I could not do something in Tomb Sweeping Day for many years.
sentences.chinese: 很多年我都沒有辦法在清明節這天祭奠祖人。

sentences.english: The same day O-nami entered the wrestling contests and won.
sentences.chinese: 這天巨浪參加了相撲比賽，他贏了。

sentences.english: The day was cool and rather lustreless; the first note of autumn had been struck.
sentences.chinese: 這天天氣陰涼，光線暗淡，秋色已開始來臨。

sentences.english: The following are the pictures of the day. No good shootings. Just view the way you like.
sentences.chinese: 下面是這天活動的照片，拍得不好，見笑了。

sentences.english: Join clubs after this date - any time.
sentences.chinese: 過了這天，你隨時可以加入俱樂部。

sentences.english: The weather promises a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 這天氣預兆着有好收成。

sentences.english: Many people eat more at Thanksgiving than at any other time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 很多人在感恩節這天喫的比年裏任何時候都多。

sentences.english: Maiden, that read'st this simple rhyme.
sentences.chinese: 少女，快閱讀這天然的華章。

definition: time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
